title: Recon Scope
summaries: The Recon Scope is a post-Golem Hardmode accessory that combines the effects of the Sniper Scope and the aggro-reducing effect of the Putrid Scent. Like other accessories crafted with the Putrid Scent, it does not inherit the Putrid Scent's bonus to damage and critical strike chance.
